## Overview
Tipseen is an virtual unboxing experience that helps users get started with the system.
<Canvas>
  <Story name="Overview"
         args={
           {
            title: "title",
            children: "Popover message will appear here loremipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶",
            position: Tipseen.positions.RIGHT,
            isDismissHidden: false
           }
         }>
    { tipseenTemplate.bind({}) }
  </Story>
</Canvas>

<UsageGuidelines guidelines={[

## Variants
### Default
<Canvas>
  <Story name="Default">
    <Tipseen
      // The modifier's purpose is to prevent the tipseen from being displayed when the user scrolls the story upwards / downwards.
      // Therefore, there is no need to move this prop in your implementations.
      modifiers={modifiers}
      position={Tipseen.positions.RIGHT}
      content={
        <TipseenContent
          title="This is a title"
          isDismissHidden
        >
          Popover message will appear here loremipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶
        </TipseenContent>
      }
    >
      <div className="monday-style-story-tipseen_container" />
    </Tipseen>
  </Story>
</Canvas>

### Tipseen with a wizard
Use when the tip is too long or when you want to teach something in steps.
<Canvas>
  <Story name="Tipseen with a wizard">
    {() => {
      const content = [
        <div>Popover message will appear here loremipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>,
        <div>Popover message will appear here loremipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>,
        <div>Popover message will appear here loremipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>,
        <div>Popover message will appear here loremipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>,
        <div>Popover message will appear here loremipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>
      ];
      return (
        <Tipseen
          // The modifier's purpose is to prevent the tipseen from being displayed when the user scrolls the story upwards / downwards.
          // Therefore, there is no need to move this prop in your implementations.
          modifiers={modifiers}
          position={Tipseen.positions.RIGHT}
          content={
            <TipseenWizard
              title="This is a title"
              steps={content}
              activeStepIndex={2}
            />
          }
        >
          <div className="monday-style-story-tipseen_container" />
        </Tipseen>
      )
    }}
  </Story>
</Canvas>

### Tipseen with image
<Canvas>
  <Story name="Tipseen with image">
    {() => {
      const content = [
        <div>Popover message will appear here lorem ipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>,
        <div>Popover message will appear here lorem ipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>,
        <div>Popover message will appear here lorem ipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>,
        <div>Popover message will appear here lorem ipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>,
        <div>Popover message will appear here lorem ipsum dolor samet‚Ä¶</div>
      ];
      return (
        <Tipseen
          // The modifier's purpose is to prevent the tipseen from being displayed when the user scrolls the story upwards / downwards.
          // Therefore, there is no need to move this prop in your implementations.
          position={Tipseen.positions.RIGHT}
          modifiers={modifiers}
          isCloseButtonOnImage
          content={
            <>
              <TipseenImage
                className="monday-style-story-tipseen_image"
                src={picture}
              />
              <TipseenWizard
                title="This is a title"
                steps={content}
                activeStepIndex={2}
              />
            </>
          }
        >
          <div className="monday-style-story-tipseen_big-container" />
        </Tipseen>
      )
    }}
  </Story>
</Canvas>

<ComponentRules
  rules={[
    {
      positive: {
        component:
          <div className="monday-style-story-tipseen_box">

              <Icon icon={Board} iconSize="24" /><span>üí´ Research tasks</span>
            </div>

              modifiers={modifiers}
              position={Tipseen.positions.RIGHT}
              content={
                <TipseenContent title="Step1 of 7">
                  Click on the ‚ÄúSales‚Äù board to get started
                </TipseenContent>
              }
            >
              <div className="monday-style-story-tipseen_column-item monday-style-story-tipseen_hovered">
                <Icon icon={Board} iconSize="24" /><span>Sales Pipeline</span>
              </div>
            </Tipseen>
            <div className="monday-style-story-tipseen_column-item">
              <Icon icon={BoardPrivate} iconSize="24" /><span>Marketing</span>
            </div>
          </div>,
        description:"Use tipseen in order to guide the user through a new feature or a place they‚Äôre not familiar with in the system."
      },
      negative: {
        component:
          <div className="monday-style-story-tipseen_column-wrapper">
            <Tipseen
              modifiers={modifiers}
              position={Tipseen.positions.TOP}
              content={
                <TipseenContent>
                  You still have 14 days on your Pro trial, Enjoy it!
                </TipseenContent>
              }
            >
              <div className="monday-style-story-tipseen_inline-container" />
            </Tipseen>
          </div>,
        description:<>Don‚Äôt use tipseen to provide additional information on a familiar UI. Use a <Link href="/?path=/docs/popover-tooltip--overview" withoutSpacing>Tooltip</Link> or <Link href="/?path=/docs/feedback-attentionbox--overview" withoutSpacing>Attention box</Link> instead.</>
      }
    }
  ]}
/>
